This is my favorite vlogs ever is with you and Mark! My favorite day is Christmas Eve as I get to watch the carols by candlelight which is an Australian tradition for my family and lots of other Aussies to watch and sing a long to. My next is then Christmas Day and then finally Boxing Day.

1. Christmas Eve
2.Boxing Day
3.Christmas Day

nothing beats the excitement on Christmas eve !

My father's birthday is on Christmas day, we normally all come together (I have 3 older sisters with husbands and in total 5 kids + my own boyfriend), so it is actually always quite a nice, but REALLY stressful day for me. That is why I like Christmas eve more because we just pull open a bottle of prosecco at midnight with fewer people and lots of snacks haha! And boxing day was always the day that I and my dad would just relax together and eat all the left-overs, so definitely a fav! Really going to miss doing all of that this year... we have to do separate visits this year and it makes me feel really sad ğŸ˜” So thank you so much for cheering me up with vlogmas, it really helps!
